author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: Really really nice part useage
review:
Opening;

Lego monthly mini model build frog is very nice with one particularly great part useage .

The build-

 The build starting at the head has a pearl gold crystal piece as a crown atop a 2×2 green jumper , the eyes are the standard 1×1 prints and there is a suggestion of a tongue with a modified 1×2 red plate . The body and legs are nice two with a continuous yellow chest , outstretched rear legs and sloped back but the best part is the legs as the use a plant piece as the webed feet this is perfect and the legs are fine . The stand is just a 2×6 blue plate and two lime green plant parts and they are fine .

In conclusion-

this is a very good in store build and I would definitely recommend it to many genres of Lego fans .
